title: Sin In Their Blood
description: He Never Looked for Trouble - It Came to Him Naturally! MATT ISN'T LOOKING FOR TROUBLE in spite of his reputation as the toughest private eye in town--feels he's changed since what he's been through-fighting in Korea... MATT ISN'T LOOKING FOR TROUBLE the night they find the blonde-very luscious and very dead-but somebody doesn't like Matt's being there-and soon lets him know it... BUT MATT DOESN'T WAIT FOR TROUBLE TO FIND HIM when he knows the same killer is threatening a girl he wants-whose kisses are too warm and alive to be put on ice by bullets! WITH HATE IN HIS HEART AND A .45 IN HIS HAND, MATT RANZINO WALKS THE CITY-SO WATCH OUT, TROUBLE-THIS TIME MATT'S LOOKING FOR YOU!!!  - Summary by Back cover of first edition
